meanings.definition: The ability to perceive or become aware of something through the senses.
meanings.sent1: Her perceptivities allowed her to notice even the smallest details in the painting.
meanings.sent2: His perceptivities were heightened after practicing mindfulness.
meanings.sent3: The detective's perceptivities were so sharp, he could solve any mystery in no time.
meanings.sent4: She possessed perceptivities akin to a hawk spotting its prey from high above.
meanings.sent5: The artist's perceptivities transformed ordinary scenes into extraordinary masterpieces.

meanings.definition: The quality of being perceptive or having keen insight.
meanings.sent1: The professor's perceptivities in understanding complex theories were unmatched.
meanings.sent2: She admired his perceptivities in analyzing people's behavior.
meanings.sent3: His perceptivities in finding the best deals made him the thriftiest shopper in town.
meanings.sent4: The writer's perceptivities shone through in her ability to capture emotions in words.
meanings.sent5: The coach's perceptivities in reading the game led to a winning strategy.
